steps.nodeStepDescription: Increases the reload speed of this weapon when its mag is empty.
Reloading this weapon has a chance to grant a larger than normal magazine.
Increases the pick-up radius of ammo drops for this weapon.
Rockets create cluster bombs when they detonate.
Rockets from this weapon will detonate early based on proximity to targets.
Shells fired from this weapon track their targets

Boost to Velocity.

Less recoil. 
Penalty to Blast Radius.

More predictable recoil. 
Slight boost to Velocity and decrease to Blast Radius.

Increased recoil.
This weapon handles and reloads faster when the wielder is the last living player of their Fireteam.
Kills with this weapon while critically wounded have a chance to start regenerating health.
Kills with this weapon grant a brief boost to the sprint's top speed.
Kills with this weapon reduce the cooldown of your grenade.
Quick unassisted kills with this weapon reduce grenade and melee cooldown.
This weapon gains increased reload and handling when two or more enemies are in close proximity.
This launcher's tube can hold three shells.
Increases warhead velocity.
Increases carried Ammo capacity.
Aiming this weapon is incredibly fast.
This weapon can be drawn unbelievably fast.
Increases weapon stability.
This weapon has extremely low recoil.
Increases warhead blast radius.
Switch weapons faster. Move quicker while aiming.
Reload this weapon even faster.
This weapon causes Void Damage.
This weapon causes Solar Damage.
This weapon causes Arc Damage.
Consume a more powerful Weapon to boost the Attack value of this Weapon.
Activates a Red Chroma glow.
Activates a Blue Chroma glow.
Activates a Yellow Chroma glow.
Activates a White Chroma glow.
Activates an Orange Chroma glow.
Activates a Magenta Chroma glow.
Activates a Green Chroma glow.
Deactivates Chroma glow and randomly resets the Chroma node. Any active Chroma on this item will be lost.
